subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry played 18 holes at Bethpage Black and pronounced the course “great,” and said he thought the wet conditions would lead to lower scores than were shot here in 2002.
snippet: Kenny Perry played 18 holes at Bethpage Black and pronounced the course “great,” and said he thought the wet conditions would lead to lower scores than were shot here in 2002.
